Summary: Organized groupings of light over cow pasture behi
divs: sighting detailswitness statement:1. in house looking out glass doors. 2. wife noticed orange line of lights attreetop level in cow pasture behind house. 3. possibly a fire in a palm tree. 4.wewent outside to see what it was. it began grouping into lines of 2 or three,then three in triangular pattern. single objects would split into two or moreand then go back together. final appearance same night was at least seven in aneat row at tree top level. three shut off, two appeared far above treetops.zoomed in with digital zoom on super-8 sony camera revealing cluster of threelights pulsating red\yellow\orange in triangle shape. video does not do itjustice. autozoom worked terribly, very pixelated. nonetheless, quite amazing.please, only those in official capacity at mufon to contact me or even mentionmyname. please no hoopla. to view area of sighting, go towww.appraiser.co.brevard.fl.us (county appraisers web site) and enter lakeandrew drive to search. west side of lake andrew drive. view 1999 aerial view ofcow pasture and developing subdivision.
